name: Down the Rabbit Hole (itch) (Kakatroflmao)
description: After a science experiment gone wrong, cute office pet Hops the bunny is now merged with a monstrous creature from the beyond. Now able to transform between monster and bunny form with a newfound intelligence and passion for murder. Using the strengths of each form, use stealth and power to help Hops achieve her independence by solving cute fun puzzles and KILLING YOUR ENEMIES.
